aboutMe.aboutMeContent: My programming journey began in 2020. Initially, I was captivated by game development, diving into GML and Game Maker Studio 2. However, my path led me to web development, and now I'm working as a Bitcoin open-source developer with a grantee by Vinteum, where I'm contributing to the Bitcoin ecosystem.
aboutMe.experienceContent: I am currently a Bitcoin open-source developer with a grantee provided by Vinteum, where I contribute to Bitcoin-related projects and continue to enhance my technical skills. My educational background aligns with my career aspirations as I am enrolled in the Information Systems program at Unifebe.
